successes.title: Conan
successes.description:
Relive the epic saga of Conan and his companions in a boardgame inspired by the writings of Robert E. Howard.
For 2 to 5 players.

Pledges.description:
BARBARIAN PLEDGE
The Barbarian level pledge will get you a standard game box along with ALL the stretch goals unlocked during the campaign.
*Shipping charged after campaign ends.

Early Bird - KING PLEDGE
The King level pledge is a deluxe box that will only be available during the kickstarter campaign. On top of this exclusive content, we will also include ALL the stretch goals that are unlocked during the campaign.
*Shipping charged after campaign ends.
